com.burstly.lib.persistance.preferences.db
Class DatabaseBasedPreferences

java.lang.Object
  com.burstly.lib.persistance.preferences.db.DatabaseBasedPreferences
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPreferences
public class DatabaseBasedPreferences
extends Object
implements IPreferences

Data base implementation of storing preferences. Actual implementation was taken from https://github.com/hamsterready/dbpreferences.
The point of using this implementation is to solve next issues:

  • http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=14359
  • lack of support for multiple processes access to SharedPreferences

Author:
Alexey Redinskii
